profile.short-bio: I am Farid Teymouri, a cybersecurity specialist and software and web developer, who started my career in 2009.
profile.sentences-1: Full Stack Developer with DevOps Focus

about.item-1: I have over 16 years of professional experience in software development, DevOps, and server and website security, with strong expertise in designing and implementing stable, secure, and modern web-based systems.
about.item-2: Proficient in Laravel, Nuxt.js, SQL Server, API development, CMS design, WHMCS modules, and firewall configurations; delivering scalable, secure applications for diverse projects.
about.item-3: Dedicated to exploring innovative technologies and transforming concepts into efficient solutions through independent and collaborative initiatives.
about.item-4: Firewall Specialist at Ashiyane Security Group (April 2009 - April 2012): Through consistent technical contributions and active participation on the website and online forum, I progressed from a regular user to a forum administrator.
about.item-5: Software Developer for Various Companies and Projects (April 2013 - April 2021): Contributed to accounting software 'holoo' with SQL Server optimizations and API updates; transitioned to freelance short-term projects including CMS plugins, custom CMS designs, and WHMCS modules, focusing on web development.
about.item-6: Software Developer at Maral Host Web Hosting (April 2020 - April 2022): Completed three web-focused projects, including CMS development and WHMCS modules; earned an official employer satisfaction certificate.
about.item-7: Creator of Personal Laravel-Nuxt Project (April 2022 - January 2026): I have dedicated over three years to developing my personal, comprehensive project, significantly enhancing my technical and managerial skills. Due to insufficient funding, the projectâ€™s launch has been delayed.
